text: Ate uha loka usa vica cikanage, ki he sade palanahara! Sanu isa vicom kadha lai huna asim cage karama karange. Usa nalom vakhare jihare asim karade rahe ham. Ki asim' tuhanu ini umara nahim' diti ki je samajhana huda tam tusim samajha lainde ate tuhade kola savadhana karana vala ala'i'a. Huna bhugatom, zalimam da ko'i sathi nahim
